channel.title: KBDs kill me and im owner ? I need help on how to ( in description )
channel.description: Kbs ( king black dragon ) or any other strong NPC kill me in my own server were im owner ... how can i make myself kill any npc with 1 hit and it wont be able to drain my hp ?

item.title: KBDs kill me and im owner ? I need help on how to ( in description )
item.dc:creator: @dragdrag1 dragdrag1
item.description:
@dragdrag1 wrote:

dude… i pasted this
Code:
if(playerRights == “3” || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == true)) { // <3 djdoyle1!
IsDead = false;
misc.println(“You got saved by djdoyle1 yay!”);
}else{
ApplyDead();
}

  • instead of something like [ifattackingon…etc = null ! , so i changed it into the code ur told me… and didnt wrk … help

i pasted in client.java ( server file )[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2009, 09:56:18 am[/size][hr]none of those wrked…:S confused…-.-…I CNT EVEN COMPILE IT -.- but i dno were to paste the codes…

item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:3, topic:313547”]if(owner == “gay” || owner==“extragay”)) {
misc.println(“Wicked! Your gay!”);
}else{
misc.pintln(“Woot! Your not gay!”);
}

Nah Jokes XD. Search for:
if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == false) {

and add this insted of that method:

if(playerRights == “3” || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == true)) { // <3 djdoyle1!
IsDead = false;
misc.println(“You got saved by djdoyle1 yay!”);
}else{
ApplyDead();
}[/quote]

TERRIBLE, makes it so no one can die

dragdrag1:

where can i paste the code? what file ?

dude.
its not in isdead
reason 1. is dead is when a npc dies.
reason 2.isdead does not let you kill a npc.
just pickup a dragonstone ring
and dont let anyone use it.
problem solved.
